qtIS8yLZmEaP.code:
/*
@title intro_1
*/

const mode = "<root:C3 root:G3 root:F3 <root:E3 root:A3>>"
const chord = "<Cmaj7 <G7 G9> <Fmaj7 Fmaj9> <Em7 Am7>>"
const chord2 = "<Cmaj7 <G7 G9> <Fmaj7 Fmaj9> <Em7 Am7>>"

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("-5")).struct("[- x] - [- - x x] [- [x x]]").clip(.65))
  .s("epiano").gain(0.4).shape(0.3).room(.2)
  .hpf(300)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("0")).struct("[x -] - [- < - - - x>] -").clip(.7))
  .s("epiano2").shape(0.2).room(0.15).echo(3, 1/4, .4).velocity(0.22).delay(.15)
  .pan(rand)

$: bd("<-!28 [bd bd]!2 [bd!4] [bd - bd bd]>*4", true)
$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>*4".layer(x => x.add("0")))
  .s("sine").gain(0.22).room(0.3).shape(0.3).room(.5)

/*
@title intro_2
*/

const mode = "<root:C3 root:G3 root:F3 <root:E3 root:A3>>"
const chord = "<Cmaj7 <G7 G9> <Fmaj7 Fmaj9> <Em7 Am7>>"
const chord2 = "<Cmaj7 <G7 G9> <Fmaj7 Fmaj9> <Em7 Am7>>"

$: rise()

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("-5")).struct("[- x] - [- - x x] [- [x x]]").clip(.65))
  .s("epiano").gain(0.4).shape(0.3).room(.2)
  .hpf(300)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("0")).struct("[x -] - [- < - - - x>] -").clip(.7))
  .s("epiano2").shape(0.2).room(0.15).echo(3, 1/4, .4).velocity(0.22).delay(.15)
  .pan(rand)

$: cat(
  bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4", true),
  bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4", true),
  bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4", true),
  bd("<[bd bd] bd [bd - - bd] [- [bd bd]]>*4", true),
  bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4", true),
  bd("<[bd bd] bd [bd - - bd] [- [bd bd]]>*4", true),
  bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4", true),
  bd("<[bd bd] [bd - - bd] [bd!4] [bd - bd!2]>*4", true),
)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>*4".layer(x => x.add("0")))
  .s("sine").gain(0.22).room(0.3).shape(0.3).room(.5)

vjk2XQ9EN0rt.code:
/*
@title A_1
*/

const mode = "<root:C3 root:G3 root:F3 <root:E3 root:A3>>"
const chord = "<Cmaj7 G7 Fmaj7 <Em7 Am7>>"
const chord2 = "<Cmaj7 G7 Fmaj7 <Em7 Am7>>"

$: noise()
$: n("<0>/8").s("crash").gain(0.3).room(0.6)

$: chords(choose("5","1","7","3","4").layer(x => x.add("-5,-10,-15")).struct("<x x - - - - - x>*8"))
  .s("chiptune").gain(.15).room(0.2).shape(0.8).pan(rand)

$: chords("<0,1,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("0")).struct("[x -] - [- < - - - x>] -").clip(.7))
  .s("epiano2").shape(0.8).room(.3).echo(3, 1/4, .4)
  .velocity(.05)
  .delay(.3)
  .pan(rand)
  .hpf(300)

$: chords(choose("4","7","1","8").struct("<- - - - x x - x>*16").layer(x => x.add("0,5")).clip(.4))
  .s("triangle").gain(.007).room(0.1)
  .pan(choose("0.2","0.3","0.4","0.6","0.7"))
  .shape(0.99)
  .hpf(900)

$: chords("<5 1 12 3>*8".struct("<- [- x] [x [x x]] [x [x x]]>*4")
    .velocity(0.09)
    .when("<0 0 0 [1 [0 0]]>*4", x => x.velocity(0.03))
    .layer(x => x.add("0")).clip(.35), chord2)
  .s("triangle").room(0.1)
  .shape(0.99)
  .pan(rand)
  .hpf(700)

$: chords("<[0 1]!4 <[0 2] [2 4]>!4>*4".layer(x => x.add("-5")))
  .gain(0.7).clip(.65).shape(0.3).room(.5)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3>".layer(x => x.add("0,5")))
  .s("sine").gain(0.1).room(0.3).shape(0.3).room(.5)

$: stack(
  bd("<<bd!3 [bd bd]> bd [bd - - bd] [- <bd!3 [bd bd]>]>*4"),
  cat(
    hh("<- hh>*8"),
    hh("<- hh>*8"),
    hh("<- hh>*8"),
    hh("<- hh - hh - hh - [hh hh]>*8"),
    hh("<- hh>*8"),
    hh("<- hh>*8"),
    hh("<- hh>*8"),
    hh("<- hh - hh - hh - [- hh]>*8"),
  ),
  oh("<-!63 oh>*8"),
  cat(
    silence,
    silence,
    silence,
    silence,
    silence,
    silence,
    silence,
    s("pat1").slice(16, "<- [3 [3 3]*2] - 1>*4")
      .when("1 1 0 [1 1 1 1]", x=>x.velocity(0.55))
      .gain(.7).shape(0.3).legato(0.7)
      .hpf(7000)
    ,
  ),

  // subbass
  chords("<0,1,2,3,4>*4".layer(x => x.add("0")).struct("x*8").sometimesBy(.3, x=>x.ply(2)).clip(.6), chord)
  .s("sine").gain(0.08).room(0.3).shape(0.8).room(.5).bpf(400)
)

7xeDaJ5IVrYM.code:
/*
@title chorus
*/

const mode = "<root:F3 root:E3 root:A3 [root:G3 <root:C4 root:A3>]>"
const chord = "<FM7 E7 Amadd9 [Gm7 <C7_2 A7>]>"

$: noise()
$: rise()
$: n("<0>/8".freq(50)).s("crash").gain(0.5).room(0.6)

$: chords("<[0 0] [1 [6 6]] [1@2 3 4] [3 5 6 7]>*4".layer(x => x.add("-5,-15,0,5"))
  .sometimesBy(.2, x => x.ply(1)))
  .s("epiano2").gain(0.2).room(0.2).release(0.01)
  .clip(choose("0.35","0.3")).room(.2).delay(.3).pan(rand)
  .hpf(200)
  .shape(.2)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("-10,-5,0")))
  .struct("x x [x@2 - x] [- [x]]").clip(.85)
  .s("epiano").gain(0.45).shape(0.3).room(.4).size(2)
  .hpf(300)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("-5")))
  .struct("x x [x@2 - x] [- [x]]").clip(.85)
  .s("epiano2").gain(0.2).shape(0.35).room(.3).size(2)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3>".layer(x => x.add("0")))
  .s("sine").gain(0.4).room(0.3).shape(0.3).room(.5)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("0")).struct("[x -] - [- < - - - x>] -").clip(.7))
  .s("epiano2").shape(0.8).room(.3).echo(3, 1/4, .4)
  .velocity(.03)
  .delay(.3)
  .pan(rand)
  .hpf(300)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("0")).struct("[- x] - [- < - - - x>] -").clip(.7))
  .s("epiano2").shape(0.8).room(.8).velocity(0.05).pan(rand)
  .hpf(550)

$: chords(choose("0","1","7","3","4").layer(x => x.add("-5,-10")).struct("x!7 [x x]").clip(.7))
  .degradeBy(.3)
  .s("chiptune").gain(.2).room(0.2).shape(0.8).pan(rand)

$: chords("<[0 1]!4 <[0 2] [2 4]>!4>*4".layer(x => x.add("-5,0")))
  .gain(0.8).clip(.65).shape(0.3).room(.5)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".add(-15).layer(x => x.add("0,5")))
  .struct("~ ~ x ~ x ~ x x ~ ~ x x ~ x x x")
  .degradeBy(.35)
  .s("chiptune")
  .velocity(choose(0.7, 0.9))
  .shape(0.3)
  .room(0.3)
  .release(0.04)
  .delay(0.2)
  .decay(choose(0.1, 0.13))
  .gain(.4)
  .legato(0.7)

// rhythm
$: stack(
  s("pat2").slice(16, "<- 1>*4").velocity(0.4).gain(.2).shape(0.9).legato(0.7).bpf(4000).room(.2),
  s("pat1").slice(16, "<- [3 [3 3]*2] - 1>*4")
    .when("1 1 0 [1 1 1 1]", x=>x.velocity(0.55))
    .gain(.7).shape(0.3).legato(0.7)
    .hpf(7000),
)

$: bd("<<bd!3 [bd bd]> bd [bd - - bd] [- <bd!3 [bd bd]>]>*4")
$: oh("<- oh>*8")

/*
@title chorus after_2
*/

dict = "chorus_after_2"
const mode = "<root:F3 root:E3 root:A3 [<root:F3 root:A3> <root:C4 root:E3>]>"
const chord = "<FM7 E7 Amadd9 [<Fmaj7 A7_4> <C7_2 E7_3>]>"

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("-5")).struct("[- x] - [- - x x] [- [x x]]").clip(.65))
  .s("epiano").gain(0.4).shape(0.3).room(.2)
  .hpf(300)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("0")).struct("[x -] - [- < - - - x>] -").clip(.7))
  .s("epiano2").shape(0.2).room(0.15).echo(3, 1/4, .4).velocity(0.22).delay(.15)
  .pan(rand)

$: chords(choose("5","1","7","3","4").layer(x => x.add("-5,-10")).struct("x!4 - x - [x x]").clip(.65))
  .degradeBy(.1)
  .s("chiptune").gain(.1).room(0.2).shape(0.8).pan(rand)
  
$: cat(
    bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4", true),
    bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4", true),
    bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4", true),
    bd("<[bd bd] bd [bd - - bd] [- [bd bd]]>*4", true),
    bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4", true),
    bd("<[bd bd] bd [bd - - bd] [- [bd bd]]>*4", true),
    bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4", true),
    bd("<[bd bd] [bd - - bd] [bd!4] [bd - bd!2]>*4", true),
  )

$: cat(
    silence,
    silence,
    silence,
    silence,
    s("<- hh>*8").bank("tr808").legato(0.2).gain(1.7),
    s("<- hh>*8").bank("tr808").legato(0.2).gain(1.7),
    s("<- hh>*8").bank("tr808").legato(0.2).gain(1.7),
    s("<- hh>*8").bank("tr808").legato(0.2).gain(1.7),
  )
  
// subbass
$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>*4".layer(x => x.add("0,5")).sometimesBy(.3, x=>x.ply(choose(2,4))).clip(choose(.75,.5)))
  .s("sine").gain(0.14).room(0.3).shape(0.3).room(.2)
  .hpf(200)

/*
@title C2_1
*/

dict = "C2_1"
const mode = "<root:e3 root:A3 root:g3 <root:c3 root:b3>>"
const chord = "<Em Am_2 G <Cmaj7 Bm7b5>>"
const chord2 = "<Em Am_2 G <Cmaj7 Bm7b5>>"

$: noise()
$: n("<0>/8".freq(50)).s("crash").gain(0.4).room(0.6)

$: backing("0,10", 0.8)
$: backing("5", 0.15)

$: chords(choose("5","1","7","3","4").layer(x => x.add("-5,-10,-15")).struct("<x x - ->*8"))
  .s("chiptune").gain(.15).room(0.2).shape(0.8).pan(rand)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("0")).struct("<[- x] ->*4").clip(.7))
  .s("epiano2").shape(0.8).room(.7).velocity(0.06).pan(rand)
  .hpf(550)

$: chords(choose("1","7","4","8").struct("<- - - - x x x x>*16").layer(x => x.add("0,5")).clip(.5))
  .s("triangle").gain(.006).room(0.1)
  .pan(choose("0.2","0.3","0.4","0.6","0.7"))
  .shape(0.99)
  .hpf(900)

$: chords("<5 1 12 3>*8".struct("<- [- x] [x [x x]] [x [x x]]>*4")
    .velocity(0.06)
    .when("<0 0 0 [1 [0 0]]>*4", x => x.velocity(0.01))
    .layer(x => x.add("0")).clip(.35), chord2)
  .s("triangle").room(0.1)
  .shape(0.99)
  .pan(rand)
  .hpf(700)

$: chords("<[0 1]!4 <[0 2] [1 3]>!4>*4".layer(x => x.add("-5")))
  .gain(1.4).clip(.5).shape(0.3).room(.3)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3>".layer(x => x.add("0")))
  .s("sine").gain(0.2).room(0.3).shape(0.3).room(.5)
  
$: stack(
  bd("<<bd!3 [bd bd]> bd [bd - - bd] [- <bd!3 [bd bd]>]>*4"),
  oh("<[- -] [- oh] [- -] [- oh]>*4"),
  oh("<- oh>*8").clip(.1).gain(.5),
  s("pat1").slice(16, "<- - [3 [3 3]*2] 1>*4")
  .when("1 1 0 [1 1 1 1]", x=>x.velocity(0.55))
  .gain(.7).shape(0.3).legato(0.7)
  .hpf(7000),

    // subbass
  chords("<0,1,2,3,4>*4".layer(x => x.add("0")).struct("x*8").sometimesBy(.3, x=>x.ply(2)).clip(.6), chord)
  .s("sine").gain(0.08).room(0.3).shape(0.8).room(.5).bpf(400)
)

/*
@title C2_2
*/

dict = "C2_2"
const mode = "<root:e3 <root:a3 root:f3> root:g3 <root:c3 root:c4>>"
const chord = "<Em <Am_2 Fmadd11> G Cmaj7>"
const chord2 = "<Em <Am_2 Fm> G Cmaj7>"

$: noise()
$: rise()

$: backing("0,10", 0.8)
$: backing("5", 0.25)

$: chords("<0,1,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("0,10")).struct("<[x - - x] [- - x -]>*4").gain(.25).clip(.5), chord2).s("epiano2").room(.1)
$: chords(choose("5","1","7","3","4").layer(x => x.add("-5,-10,-15")).struct("<x x - ->*8"))
  .s("chiptune").gain(.15).room(0.2).shape(0.8).pan(rand)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("0")).struct("<[- x] ->*4").clip(.7))
  .s("epiano2").shape(0.8).room(.7).velocity(0.06).pan(rand)
  .hpf(550)

$: chords(choose("1","7","4","8").struct("<- - - - x x x x>*16").layer(x => x.add("0,5")).clip(.5))
  .s("triangle").gain(.006).room(0.1)
  .pan(choose("0.2","0.3","0.4","0.6","0.7"))
  .shape(0.99)
  .hpf(900)

$: chords("<5 1 12 3>*8".struct("<- [- x] [x [x x]] [x [x x]]>*4")
    .velocity(0.06)
    .when("<0 0 0 [1 [0 0]]>*4", x => x.velocity(0.01))
    .layer(x => x.add("0")).clip(.35), chord2)
  .s("triangle").room(0.1)
  .shape(0.99)
  .pan(rand)
  .hpf(700)

$: chords("<[0 1]!4 <[0 2] [0 1]>!4>*4".layer(x => x.add("-5")))
  .gain(1.5).clip(.5).shape(0.3).room(.3)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3>".layer(x => x.add("0")))
  .s("sine").gain(0.2).room(0.3).shape(0.3).room(.5)

$: stack(
  cat(
    bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4"),
    bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4"),
    bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4"),
    bd("<[bd bd] bd [bd - - bd] [- [bd bd]]>*4"),
    bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4"),
    bd("<[bd bd] bd [bd - - bd] [- [bd bd]]>*4"),
    bd("<[bd bd]!4>*4"),
    bd("<[bd bd] [bd - bd bd] [bd!4]!2>*4"),
  ),
  oh("<- oh>*8").clip(.08),
  cat(
    oh("<[- -] [- oh] [- -] [- oh]>*4"),
    oh("<[- -] [- oh] [- -] [- oh]>*4"),
    oh("<[- -] [- oh] [- -] [- oh]>*4"),
    oh("<[- -] [- oh] [- -] [- oh]>*4"),
    oh("<- oh>*8"),
    oh("<- oh>*8"),
    oh("<- oh>*8"),
    oh("<- oh>*8"),
  ),
  s("pat1").slice(16, "<- - [3 [3 3]*2] 1>*4")
    .when("1 1 0 [1 1 1 1]", x=>x.velocity(0.55))
    .gain(.7).shape(0.3).legato(0.7)
    .hpf(7000),

    // subbass
  chords("<0,1,2,3,4>*4".layer(x => x.add("0")).struct("x*8").sometimesBy(.3, x=>x.ply(2)).clip(.6), chord)
  .s("sine").gain(0.08).room(0.3).shape(0.8).room(.5).bpf(400)
)

/*
@title chorus_2
*/

const mode = "<root:F3 root:E3 root:A3 [root:G3 <root:C4 root:A3>]>"
const chord = "<FM7 E7 Amadd9 [Gm7 <C7_2 A7>]>"

$: n("<0>/8".freq(50)).s("crash").gain(0.35).room(0.6)
$: noise()
$: rise()

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("-10,-5,0")))
  .struct("x x [x@2 - x] [- [x]]").clip(.4)
  .s("epiano").gain(0.4).shape(0.3).room(.2).size(2)
  .hpf(350)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("-5")))
  .struct("x x [x@2 - x] [- [x]]").clip(.85)
  .s("epiano2").gain(0.25).shape(0.4).room(.2).size(2).hpf(500)

$: chords("<0,1,2,3,4>".layer(x => x.add("0")))
  .struct("x x [x@2 - x] [- [x]]").clip(.8)
  .s("epiano2")
  .gain(0.3).shape(0.35).room(.2).size(2)
  .pan(rand)

$: chords("<[0 1]!4 <[0 2] [2 4]>!4>*4".layer(x => x.add("-5,0")))
  .struct("x x [x@2 - x] [- [x]]").clip(.6)
  .gain(0.8).clip(.65).shape(0.3).room(.2)

// rhythm
$: stack(
  s("pat2").slice(16, "<- 1>*4").velocity(0.4).gain(.2).shape(0.9).legato(0.7).bpf(4000),
  s("pat1").slice(16, "<- [3 [3 3]*2] - 1>*4")
    .when("1 1 0 [1 1 1 1]", x=>x.velocity(0.55))
    .gain(.7).shape(0.3).legato(0.7)
    .hpf(7000),
)

$: cat(
  bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4"),
  bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4"),
  bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4"),
  bd("<[bd bd] bd [bd - - bd] [- [bd bd]]>*4"),
  bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- bd]>*4"),
  bd("<[bd bd] bd [bd - - bd] [- [bd bd]]>*4"),
  bd("<bd bd [bd - - bd] [- [bd bd]]>*4"),
  bd("<[bd bd] [bd - bd bd] [bd!4] [bd - bd bd]>*4"),
)

$: oh("<- oh>*8")
